NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: Friends, I shall be returning to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> soon. If the next shipment is ready, I would love to help deliver the new shipment of ore along the way!
2 1
COLEUS: Your kindness is deeply appreciated, Yarrow! However, we won't be sending the ore we have just mined to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> just yet.
3 2
COLEUS: However, we won't be sending the ore we have just mined to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> just yet.
4 3
COLEUS: You see, the ore here has to be sent to the <color=orange>Volcanic Testing Site</color> to be processed first, before it is ready to be used.
5 4
YARROW: In that case, Root is planning to return to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> soon! Perhaps he will be able to assist in the delivery, then.
6 5
COLEUS: I'll be sure to inquire for his assistance before he takes off! You have my deepest gratitude, Yarrow.
